dailyTip.title: Daily Tip
tips: Your current streak is your commitment to yourself. Protect it.
Small daily actions create big long-term changes.
Progress isn't always visible. Trust the process.

socialMedia.title: Social Media Analysis
socialMedia.description: Connect your social media profiles so the AI can analyze your activity and provide better context

dailyTipCard.title: Tip of the Day
genericTips: Start the day with a small, achievable goal. Momentum is your best ally.
Consistency beats talent. Do one thing well today, even if it's small.
Your current streak is your commitment to yourself. Protect it.
Habits are built with daily decisions. What do you choose today?
Progress isn't always visible. Trust the process.
Every day is an opportunity to be 1% better than yesterday.
Don't break the chain. Your future self will thank you.
Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.

focusRoomDailyTip.title: Daily Tip
focusRoomDailyTip.focusOnGoals: Focus on completing your pending goals today.

health: Consistency in exercise is more important than intensity. Move today, even if just a little.
Your body is your permanent home. Take care of it with small daily decisions.
mental: A few minutes of meditation can transform your day. Why not start now?
Mental peace is not the absence of problems, but the ability to deal with them.
career: Every small achievement brings you closer to your professional goal. What will you do today to advance?
Professional success is the sum of small efforts repeated day after day.
finance: Saving isn't about depriving yourself, it's about prioritizing your future over momentary impulses.
Every dollar saved is a vote of confidence in your future.
relationships: Relationships are nurtured by small consistent gestures, not by sporadic big events.
Active listening is the most valuable gift you can give someone.
personal: Personal growth is not a destination, it's a daily journey of small improvements.
Dedicate time to what you love. It's an investment in your happiness.

defaultTips: Every day is an opportunity to be 1% better.
Progress isn't always visible. Trust the process.

checkIn.title: Daily Check-in
checkIn.description: Share how you're feeling today. This will help Nudge give you better support.
checkIn.notesPlaceholder: Is there anything you'd like to share?
deepQuestions: What stopped you from exercising this week?
What was your biggest distraction yesterday?
What excuse did you give yourself for not moving forward today?
What habit did you break and why?
What decision did you avoid making today?
At what moment of the day did you lose focus?
What commitment to yourself did you not fulfill?

socialMedia.title: Social Media Analysis
socialMedia.description: Connect your profiles for personalized analysis
socialMedia.howItWorksDescription: The AI will analyze your posts, interactions, and usage patterns to better understand your interests, habits, and social context. This enables more personalized recommendations and a more complete tracking of your goals. Your data is protected and only used to improve your experience.
